main event: Mrs. observed a shining object moving parallel to her car for about eleven minutes.
interesting points: The object moved along her car for about four miles,The observer reported no noise or smoke from the object,An aluminum fence gate nearby could have created a visual illusion,The observer had previous experience with airplanes and helicopters but noted this object was unlike anything she had seen before,Sightings occurred on a straight highway with freshly plowed fields on both sides.
